channel.title: Server crashes
channel.description:
hey another quick question, when someone logs onto my server and they select a girl in the char seclect screen, they spawn and are allover the place, like litterly there arms and legs are lines that take up 5 squares. :eek: :D this instantly crashes my server so i have to restart it =P.
and i have another problem.. when someone selects the color of thier clothes, they allways come out black, not the skin color, but the clothes...
any way, thanks if you can help
~shrogg
